title: France panorama. [No. 72/04]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Port installations - a new lock for heavy tankers at Le Havre. Electricity and life - an exhibition to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the French Electricity Administration. 2. Gien crockery - 150th anniversary of the Gien Crockery Works. 3. Artificial plant-breeding - hydroponic plant-growth for arid regions. 4. Tapestries - the story of David and Bathsheba. A unique set of tapestries.
